name: Fuasto&Benito: Wild Wizards
description:
"Goblins do magic in a peculiar way:
cast each two seconds, hope for the best"

As goblin wizards, you  fight monsters and each other with magic, but you cannot stop casting! Each two seconds you receive a random spell, which you cast automatically, but you can move and aim to make the most of it (and hopefully don't hurt yourself)

Current game modes:

Multiplayer versus: Be the last goblin standing, or the goblin who killed more slimes.
Single player survival: Survive neverending enemies  for as long as you can

Can be played with controllers or keyboard (Player1: WASD, Player2: IJKL)
